cleaned_text: List of CAM Treatments Complementary and Alternative Medicine remedies for mental health conditions arranged by risk. Please note that this is not an exhaustive list; many treatments have suggested uses in addition to what is listed below. The listed uses are those supported by the evidence described in the outline. All items listed below, even if they don't have active links, are covered in the full summary, available for download on this site.
